1_overview.name: Overview
1_overview.rationale: Direct mapping from Jira metadata with no interpretation required

2_background.name: Background/Context
2_background.rationale: Rich Jira context with explicit problem statements; VOC provides strong customer evidence

3_target_users.name: Target Users
3_target_users.rationale: Three segments from Jira; behaviors inferred from VOC patterns

4_objectives.name: Objectives/Goals
4_objectives.rationale: Goals from Jira Expected ROI section; framework derived from objectives

5_scope.name: Scope
5_scope.rationale: Features synthesized from problem statements; Out of Scope marked TBD correctly

6_feature_docs.name: Feature Documentation
6_feature_docs.rationale: Correctly marked TBD for Design/UX agent per boundaries

7_success_metrics.name: Success Metrics/KPIs
7_success_metrics.rationale: Framework based on objectives; specific values left for Analytics

8_analytics.name: Analytics & Tracking
8_analytics.rationale: Correctly marked TBD for Analytics agent per boundaries

9_risks.name: Risks & Considerations
9_risks.rationale: Standard risks identified; may miss domain-specific technical risks

10_launch_plan.name: Launch Plan
10_launch_plan.rationale: Phased approach from Jira recommendations; timing TBD

11_post_launch.name: Post-Launch Plan
11_post_launch.rationale: Standard monitoring; governance emphasis from Jira context

12_open_questions.name: Open Questions
12_open_questions.rationale: Genuine ambiguities from Jira including platform, ownership, integration

strengths: Strong VOC integration with 35 customer feedback entries and full attribution
Clear problem-solution mapping between customer pain points and hub features
Comprehensive 12 open questions capturing genuine ambiguities
Proper TBD preservation for external agent sections
Phased MVP approach aligned with Jira recommendations
areas_for_improvement: Technical risk assessment needs engineering input
User segment characteristics need research validation
Specific success metric targets need Analytics team input
dependencies: Analytics Agent for event tracking and metric targets
Scoping Agent for Out of Scope definition

recommendations.action: Conduct user interviews with each segment
Engineering review of technical integration points
Workshop to define timeline and milestones
